name: Waste Free Oceans
goal: Waste Free Oceans is a ground breaking public-private foundation that mobilises the fisheries sector, public authorities and the international plastics industry. Our aim is to contribute to cleaner oceans by reducing and reusing floating litter. Starting as a pilot project in Europe to encourage fishermen and the plastics industry to collaborate, we now engage in marine litter clean-ups around the world. Together with companies we then turn collected waste into innovative, sustainable products.
interests: Climate Action, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
Circular economy, Waste legislation, Water legislation
Landill legislation, EMFF, MSFD
Port Reception Facilities, EU regional seas conventions
